title: Monday Post Show (11-22-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (11-22-21)
description:
Bobby starts the show by talking about how Tae from Maddie and Tae is pregnant! Bobby reviews two movies: Frost / Nixon and Just Mercy. Amy shares the story behind Escape From a House of Horror that she watched on Friday night. Eddie shares how his two boys are different after adopting them. Bobby on a new camera that captures candid photos in your home - is it creepy or cool? Plus, an armored truck spilled cash on a California highway and now police are saying people need to return it. Bobby also plays a voicemail from a kid who doesn’t want to be a snitch and needs advice on a situation at school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
